Bash(python3 -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''.''\)

print\(''Testing application functionality after fixing type hints...''\)

# Test the application modules directly
from src.models import Task, validate_task_data
from src.task_manager import TaskManager
from src.utils import validate_title, validate_description, validate_task_id, validate_menu_choice
from src.ui import display_tasks, display_error, display_success, display_info

# Test TaskManager with invalid inputs \(to ensure validation still works\)
tm = TaskManager\(\)
tm.add_task\(''Test Task'', ''Description''\)

# Test that invalid task IDs are handled correctly
result = tm.get_task\(''invalid''\)  # Should return None
print\(f''✓ get_task with invalid ID returns: {result}''\)

result = tm.update_task\(''invalid'', ''New Title''\)  # Should return False
print\(f''✓ update_task with invalid ID returns: {result}''\)

result = tm.delete_task\(''invalid''\)  # Should return False
print\(f''✓ delete_task with invalid ID returns: {result}''\)

result = tm.toggle_task_completion\(''invalid''\)  # Should return False
print\(f''✓ toggle_task_completion with invalid ID returns: {result}''\)

print\(''All validation tests passed!''\)
print\(''Application is working correctly with the type hint fixes!''\)
")
